name: Shori Conquest
description:
The Land of Emag is in trouble! Experience a new 2D retro dungeon crawler in a way like never before!

Are you up to the challenge Hero?
Choose your hero wisely, between an Egg(Yes an egg...), a mighty swordfighter, or an old... yet powerful wizard!
Traverse through 10 unique dungeons and slay the 7 mighty beasts.
Battle countless monsters, and foes in an all new real time battle system.
Collect the Shori Stones, and unlock elemental powers to use in battle and in the overworld.
Discover all the hidden secrets throughout the land.
Defeat Purdrag and rid the land of Emag from the wrath of evil!
Victory is in your hands! Remain Victorious!
